messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Fred. May I know your name, please?
It's Emma. I'm really upset about the payment issue I encountered with your Maggi Soy Sauce.
I'm sorry to hear that, Emma. Can you please elaborate on the payment issue you're experiencing?
I placed an order for Maggi Soy Sauce, but I was charged twice! This is ridiculous!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Emma. Let me look into this for you. Could you please provide me with your order number?
It's 123456. I need this sorted out immediately!
Thank you for the information, Emma. I'll check your order details right away. Please hold on for a moment.

Emma, I see that you were indeed charged twice for the same order. I sincerely apologize for this error. I will initiate a refund for the extra charge immediately. You should see the refunded amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
This is so frustrating. I shouldn't have to deal with this kind of mistake.
I completely understand your frustration, Emma, and I am truly sorry for the inconvenience. Is there anything else I can assist you with regarding your order or any other Nestlé product?
No, just make sure this doesn't happen again.
I will ensure that this issue is addressed and does not happen again. Thank you for bringing it to our attention, Emma. Have a good day.
